thread.title: iRobot CFO to Speak at Upcoming Investor Conferences
thread.title_full: iRobot CFO to Speak at Upcoming Investor Conferences

author: admin
title: iRobot CFO to Speak at Upcoming Investor Conferences
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/9/2015 @ 2:14 PM   iRobot Corp. 
BEDFORD, Mass., Sept. 9, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- iRobot Corp. (NASDAQ: IRBT), a leader in delivering robotic technology-based solutions, today announced that Alison Dean, iRobot's executive vice president and chief financial officer, will discuss the company's achievements and financial outlook on Wednesday, September 16, 2015 at 8:50 a.m. ET at the 6(th) Annual Credit Suisse Small & Mid Cap Conference in New York, and on Tuesday, September 22, 2015 at 9:10 a.m. UKT at Raymond James' 11(th) Annual North American Equities Conference in London. 
The Credit Suisse presentation will not be webcast. The Raymond James presentation will be webcast live on iRobot's investor relations website at http://investor.irobot.com/phoenix.zhtml?c=193096&p=irol-EventDetails&EventId=5196777 and for seven days thereafter. 
About iRobot Corp. iRobot designs and builds robots that empower people to do more. The company's home robots help people find smarter ways to clean, its defense & security robots protect those in harm's way, and its remote presence robots enable virtual presence from anywhere in the world. iRobot's robots feature proprietary technologies incorporating advanced concepts in navigation, mobility, manipulation and artificial intelligence. For more information about iRobot, please visit www.irobot.com . 
To view the original version on PR Newswire, visit: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/irobot-cfo-to-speak-at-upcoming-investor-conferences-300140352.html 
SOURCE iRobot Corp.
